name: history
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool papercliff.
Tool description: Papercliff looks at the world's largest news agencies, reads articles, identifies and shares keywords
API description: Fetches the number of articles published daily during the last week and the corresponding news agencies that created those articles, optionally filtering by specific terms.

terms.description: Narrows down results to articles that contain the provided keywords. The terms should consist of one to three words separated by a dash, e.g., `election-campaign`. Defaults to None.
